channel.title: PI - Friends can login but this one Friend >.<
channel.description:
Hi guys again, You might know me from asking alot of other questions, and I now have another, Well, as some of you might know, I have gotten my server public, and 3 of my friends have logged on all using windows7, and now this other friend that has windows 7 as well, cannot log in. He is the only one that cannot login, any help here? I have checked the Clien.java file and the IP is set correctly. Please help, he is dying to play :P
Thanks for the help! - DannyIsSoPro

item.title: PI - Friends can login but this one Friend >.<
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

Your server is most likely rejecting his ip.

Read full topic
